name: GetEnterpriseMembers
description:
Retrieve members of a specified enterprise on Trello.

Use this tool to get a list of members associated with a particular enterprise by providing the enterprise ID. This is useful for managing team members or reviewing enterprise membership details.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise whose members are to be retrieved. This is required to specify which enterprise's members you want to access.

value_schema.description: ID of the Enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: member_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of valid member fields to retrieve.

value_schema.description: A comma-seperated list of valid [member fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/#member-object).

parameters.name: scim_filter_query
parameters.description: SCIM-style query to filter members. Overrides member type filters and controls pagination.

value_schema.description: Pass a [SCIM-style query](/cloud/trello/scim/) to filter members. This takes precedence over the all/normal/admins value of members. If any of the below member_* args are set, the member array will be paginated.

parameters.name: sort_members
parameters.description: SCIM-style sorting value. Prefix with '-' for descending order; otherwise, it's ascending.

value_schema.description: This parameter expects a [SCIM-style](/cloud/trello/scim/) sorting value prefixed by a `-` to sort descending. If no `-` is prefixed, it will be sorted ascending. Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is 'normal' or 'admins'. Pagination can be controlled with member_startIndex, etc, but the API response will not contain the total available result count or pagination status data.

parameters.name: sort_criteria
parameters.description: Sorting option for members. Use 'sort' parameter instead, following SCIM-style sorting. Deprecated parameter.

value_schema.description: Deprecated: Please use `sort` instead. This parameter expects a [SCIM-style](/cloud/trello/scim/) sorting value. Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is 'normal' or 'admins'. Pagination can be controlled with member_startIndex, etc, but the API response will not contain the total available result count or pagination status data.

parameters.name: sort_order_for_listing
parameters.description: Defines the order for sorting members. Use values: 'ascending', 'descending', 'asc', or 'desc'. Deprecated: Prefer 'sort'.

value_schema.description: Deprecated: Please use `sort` instead. One of: `ascending`, `descending`, `asc`, `desc`.

parameters.name: member_start_index
parameters.description: An integer between 0 and 9999 indicating where to start retrieving members.

value_schema.description: Any integer between 0 and 9999.

parameters.name: member_count_filter
parameters.description: Apply a SCIM-style filter to specify the number of members to retrieve.

value_schema.description: [SCIM-style filter](/cloud/trello/scim/).

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Specify valid values for nested organization fields to retrieve specific organization-related data.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization field resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: included_board_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of values accepted by the nested board resource to specify included fields.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.
